titles.title: Fifteenth Sunday of Ordinary Time (B) - Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines:
The law of the Lord
is perfect;
it revives the soul.
The decrees of the Lord
are steadfast;
they give wisdom
to the simple.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
The fear of the Lord is pure,
abiding forever,
The judgements of the Lord
are true;
they are, all of them, just.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
They are more to be
desired than gold,
than quantities of gold.
And sweeter are they
than honey,
than honey flowing from
the comb.
